content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 30, "index": 28}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 31}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 30, "index": 33}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 28, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a sticky piston I need to craft a slimeball, a piston, and a redstone. I don't have any of these items, so I'll start with the slimeball. I'll move it from slot 17 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 30, "index": 28}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 31}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 30, "index": 33}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 28, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I'll move the piston from slot 35 to slot 4.
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: sticky_piston
inventory=[{"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 30, "index": 28}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 31}, {"type": "nether_wart_block", "quantity": 30, "index": 33}, {"type": "beehive", "quantity": 28, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the sticky piston by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
